summary: This is a docket activity notice from the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit, indicating that attorney Christian R. Everdell was terminated as counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell in the case United States of America v. Maxwell.

persons.name: Christian R. Everdell
persons.context: Attorney whose representation of Ghislaine Maxwell was terminated, as noted in a court docket filing.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the case United States of America v. Maxwell, for whom attorney Christian R. Everdell was terminated.

connections.description: Christian R. Everdell was serving as an attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, but this relationship was terminated as indicated in the court docket.

events.title: Termination of Attorney Christian R. Everdell
events.description: Attorney Christian R. Everdell was terminated as counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell in the appellate case United States of America v. Maxwell.

keyFacts: Attorney Christian R. Everdell was terminated as counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell.
The termination was recorded in the docket of the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit on April 27, 2021.
The case referenced is United States of America v. Maxwell, with case numbers 21-58 and 21-770.
